sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react" import { OPTION_ONE, OPTION_TWO } from "./PollCard" import vote from "../utils/images/vote.jpeg" class PollResults extends Component { render() { const { question, answer } = this.props const optionOneCount = question.optionOne.votes.length const optionTwoCount = question.optionTwo.votes.length const total = optionOneCount + optionTwoCount const optionOnePercentage = (optionOneCount * 100) / total + "%" const optionTwoPercentage = (optionTwoCount * 100) / total + "%" return (
Would you rather {question.optionOne.text}
{optionOnePercentage}
{optionOneCount} out of {total} votes
{answer === OPTION_ONE ? ( ) : null}
Would you rather {question.optionTwo.text}
{optionTwoPercentage}
{optionTwoCount} out of {total} votes
{answer === OPTION_TWO ? ( ) : null}
) } } export default PollResults
